title: Data Syndication Partnership Brings Connectivity's Accurate Business Listings Data to CityGrid Users
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/30/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Connectivity 
LOS ANGELES, Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Connectivity (SM), provider of advanced customer intelligence and engagement solutions, announced today that it has entered a data syndication partnership with CityGrid Media , a leading provider of business advertising solutions. Under the agreement, CityGrid will integrate Connectivity's business listings data into its Citysearch and Insider Pages networks, which reach more than 8 million consumers monthly. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271203 
"We are excited to be able to provide data that CityGrid users can rely on to easily find and connect with local businesses," said Matt Booth, CEO, Connectivity. "Our partnership with CityGrid exemplifies our commitment to ensure business listings are accurate and updated everywhere--across top directories, like Citysearch and Insider Pages, as well as online maps, in-car navigation systems, review websites, and niche industry sites." 
"Ensuring the highest quality user experience possible is critical to CityGrid's mission to help local businesses connect with customers," said Aaron Bush, General Manager, CityGrid Media. "And data accuracy is key to the user experience, which makes our partnership with Connectivity a valuable addition to our networks." 
Under the agreement, Connectivity will provide core listings data, such as business name, address, phone number, website and business categorization, as well as 17 fields of enhanced data, ranging from hours of operation and business description, to social media URL, photos and videos. 
Connectivity's Listings product ensures accurate online listings for every business location, making a business easier to find, which results in happier customers and more positive reviews. Listings is part of Connectivity's customer intelligence suite, which also includes Reviews, Customer Insights and Automated Campaigns. 
About CityGrid Media 
CityGrid is a leader in local business advertising solutions. The company connects local business advertisers with hundreds of the largest and most trafficked websites and mobile apps through CityGridÂ®, its local content and advertising network. CityGrid Media owns and operates leading local properties including Citysearch and Insider Pages. CityGrid Media is an operating business of IAC (NASDAQ: IACI). For more information, visit www.citygridmedia.com . 
About Connectivity 
Connectivity provides a suite of marketing intelligence tools for businesses with physical locations. Its customer insights product provides businesses with deep customer information and tools to market more effectively through automated email, text and social media campaigns. Connectivity also provides online listings and reviews products that help businesses monitor and manage their online presence from a single dashboard. Learn more at http://www.connectivity.com .
